[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/corpse.c

This method returns the id associated with the corpse.

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/container.c, /std/living/carrying.c and /std/basic/virtual_quit_control.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/corpse.h, /include/move_failures.h and /include/bit.h

do_decay
void do_decay()
This is called to decay the corpse. It is done in a continuous call out loop until all of the decay has been completed.

set_hold
int * set_hold(object ob,
               int pos)
set_holding
void set_holding(object * hold)
set_owner
void set_owner(string words,
               object thing)
This method initially sets up the corpse object. Generally speaking words should be 0 and the 'thing' variable should be set to the object which just died.

Parameters:
words - the owner of the object
thing - the object to get the ownership data from
